title: Day after Rahul attack on BRS, Akhilesh meets KCR to discuss Opp unity against BJP
selftext: BRS sources said SP chief sought to 'explore the possibility of KCR sending a representative' to second Opp meet in Bengaluru, although he was doing it in his personal capacity.
